dogecoin.text: Big things happening for Dogecoin

Love my Dogecoin community! 🌍

If you accept, build, or support dogecoin, share your stories with me.👇🏻I’d love to hear more about this awesome group of people.

@akematee @DogecoinFdn @tjstebbing @patowensx Thanks for sharing. Hopefully these next 2 years will accelerate retail adoption with new tools like @suchpay and @ExpressDoge available to EU nations too.

I would fly to France just to buy a pastry with Dogecoin.

@DogeSproutX @DogecoinFdn @tjstebbing @patowensx @ExpressDoge @suchpay @krisspax @thedogelist @dogecoin You’re welcome! Thank you for supporting the growing Dogecoin economy.

I look forward to seeing your continued success!

@DogeSproutX @DogecoinFdn @tjstebbing @patowensx That is so awesome! Thanks for sharing.

Have you reached out to @ExpressDoge or @suchpay about integrating Dogecoin acceptance into your existing fiat POS (point of sale system)?

Had an amazing time meeting the incredible folks from @DogecoinFdn right here in sunny Florida this weekend! 

Dogecoin isn't just about transactions; it's about uniting people from all corners of the world into one big, loving community. 

I'm all about celebrating humanity and https://t.co/plh6VsJPWV

@melton1337 @akematee @DogecoinFdn @tjstebbing @patowensx @suchpay @ExpressDoge Very cool. Some of my best friends here in Florida are Romanian. They introduced me to a Romanian drink called Pálinka last week. It was delicious. 

If you know of any local shops or stores in Romania who may be interested in learning about how to integrate Dogecoin payments

Just spent 2 hours at the bank setting up international wires for all my foreign based employees. This doesn’t include the 30 minute commute.

Dogecoin could have completed the same transactions in less than a minute. 

Dogecoin is inevitable.

Would love to have members of the Dogecoin community participate in tomorrow’s X Space about driving local Dogecoin adoption.

Dogecoin X Space TOMORROW!

You asked, and I’m delivering! After a number  of requests, I’m hosting an X Space tomorrow to dive into how we can drive local adoption of Dogecoin. This is YOUR chance to brainstorm, share ideas, hear from others currently doing it, and help shape

Had a great discussion with @tjstebbing @TeslaModelDoge @thedogelist @WburgPizza @ExpressDoge @suchpay and others about what we can do to drive dogecoin adoption as a community!

Listen here to hear the conversation👇🏻

@tutu211221 The number of units a crypto has in capped supply doesn't matter in economic reality. 

Dogecoin is designed with deflationary inflation, with about 14.4 million Dogecoins mined per day. This is a key feature required if a coin is to be used as an actual currency to serve
